page.title: 03Penrhyn Castle
page.content: There is a story that when the Houseman cleans the mirror in the gallery he sees the imprint of the hand of a young child. Today there are quite a few people working in Penrhyn Castle. The ones that are employed fulltime are the resident Administrator,his wife and his dog,also the gardener who lives in a flat in the garden;the secretary and the clerk of works. The seasonal workers include a joiner,a stonemason,an assistant gardener,a labourer,two shop workers and two people working in the tearooms. There are also 10 room stewards who take care of 13 rooms that people visit;2 men work in the railway museum.
